column5: Enjoy a private room with a comfortable, queen-sized bed and a guest bathroom just down the hallway.   Guest rooms are on separate side of the house, providing privacy when needed. Only a 15-minute drive from downtown Fort Worth, Stockyards, and Magnolia. We're off of I-20 so you'll be near TCU, Hulen Mall, and plenty of restaurants/shopping!  We have one hypoallergenic puppy named Ballot. He's a friendly little guy but we can be sure to keep him out of your way, too.
